name: Mole Invaders (AcheGames)
description:
Avoid the rocks dropped by birds and try to hit the mole invaders with the ball. You can get more points if the ball hits more than one invader. The point is to get as much points as you can.

move W,A,S,D and shoot with the mouse left click.

If you encounter any issues, I suggest you to download the compressed file for better experience.  Sometimes playing on the web, the game gets slow.
